summary: This is an email correspondence dated December 30, 2020, regarding the referral of an MLAT (Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty) request from France concerning an individual named BRUNEL. The email is sent from an unspecified sender to multiple recipients, including 'WANYS' and 'USANYS', with a copy to 'USAHUB-USAJournal111'.

events.title: Referral of MLAT Request from France
events.description: An email is sent regarding the referral of a Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty (MLAT) request from France concerning an individual named BRUNEL.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 30, 2020, concerning a legal assistance request from France.
The subject of the email is 'Referral of MLAT Request from France (BRUNEL)', indicating the request pertains to an individual named BRUNEL.
The email is addressed to 'WANYS' and 'USANYS', with a copy to 'USAHUB-USAJournal111', suggesting coordination between U.S. and possibly New York-based offices.
The document reference 'EFTA00079595' and its inclusion in 'Data Set: 9' indicates it is part of a larger collection of Epstein-related materials.
The use of an MLAT request signifies formal international legal cooperation in an investigation, likely related to the Epstein case.
